info.title: Microsoft To-Do (Business)
info.description: Microsoft To-Do is an intelligent task management app that makes it easy to plan and manage your day. Connect to Microsoft To-Do to manage your tasks from various services. You can perform actions such as creating tasks.

get.summary: When a new to-do is created
get.description: Triggers when a new to-do is created.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To trigger this, make a new to-do.

get.summary: When a new to-do in a specific folder is created
get.description: Triggers when a new to-do in a specific folder is created.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To trigger this, create a to-do in a given folder.

get.description: Triggers when a to-do is updated.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To trigger this, update a to-do.

get.summary: When a to-do in a specific folder is updated
get.description: Triggers when a to-do in a specific folder is updated.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To trigger this, update a to-do in a given folder.

get.description: Returns a list of all the to-do lists.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new to-do list.

get.description: This operation is used to get a specific to-do list.

patch.description: This operation is used to update a specific to-do list.

delete.description: This operation is used to delete a specific to-do list.

get.description: This operation is used to retrieve all to-do's from a specific list.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = 10, maximum = 999).

post.description: This operation is used to create a to-do in the specified to-do list.

get.description: This operation is used to get the to-do with the given Id.

patch.description: This operation is used to update a specific to-do.

delete.description: This operation is used to delete a task.

get.description: Returns a list of all the to-do lists.

post.description: This operation is used to create a new to-do list.

get.description: This operation is used to get a specific to-do list.
This operation is used to retrieve all to-do's from a specific list.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = 10, maximum = 999).

get.description: This operation is used to retrieve all to-do's from all lists.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Total number of entries to retrieve (default = 10, maximum = 999).

post.description: This operation is used to create a to-do in the specified to-do list (defaults to To-Do).
This operation is used to create a to-do in the specified to-do list (defaults to To-Do).

get.description: This operation is used to get the to-Do with the given Id.

patch.description: This operation is used to update a specific to-do.

delete.description: This operation is used to delete a task.

get.description: This operation is used to get the to-do with the given Id.

get.summary: When a new to-do in a specific folder is created (V2)
get.description: Triggers when a new to-do in a specific folder is created.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To trigger this, create a to-do in a given folder.

get.summary: When a to-do in a specific folder is updated (V2)
get.description: Triggers when a to-do in a specific folder is updated.
get.x-ms-trigger-hint: To trigger this, update a to-do in a given folder.

categories.title: Categories
categories.description: Collection of category names associated with the to-do.

assignedTo.title: Assigned To
assignedTo.description: Name of the person who has been assigned the to-do.

body.title: Body
body.description: To-do body that typically contains information about the to-do.

completedDateTime.title: Completed
completedDateTime.description: Date-time in the UTC time zone when the to-do was finished.

dueDateTime.title: Due
dueDateTime.description: Date in the UTC time zone when the to-do is to be finished.

isReminderOn.title: Is reminder on
isReminderOn.description: True if an alert is set to remind the user of the to-do.

owner.title: Owner
owner.description: Name of the person who created the to-do.

parentFolderId.title: Parent folder identifier
parentFolderId.description: Unique identifier of the parent folder.

reminderDateTime.title: Reminder
reminderDateTime.description: Date-time in the UTC time zone for a reminder alert of the to-do to occur.

startDateTime.title: Start
startDateTime.description: Date in the UTC time zone when the to-do is to begin.

status.title: Status
status.description: Indicates state or progress of the to-do - not started, in progress, completed, waiting on others or deferred.

subject.title: Subject
subject.description: Brief description or title of the to-do.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the to-do list.

isDefaultFolder.description: True if this is the default to-do list.

id.title: Id
id.description: Unique identifier of the to-do list.

wellknownListName.title: Well-known name
wellknownListName.description: Property indicating the well-known list name if the given list is a well-known list. Possible values are: none, defaultList, flaggedEmails, unknownFutureValue.

isOwner.title: Is owner
isOwner.description: True if the user is owner of the given task list.

isShared.title: Is shared
isShared.description: True if the task list is shared with other users.

body.title: Body
body.description: To-do body that typically contains information about the to-do.

contentType.title: Content Type
contentType.description: The type of the content. Possible values are text and html.

completedDateTime.title: Completed
completedDateTime.description: The date in the specified time zone that the task was finished.

dueDateTime.title: Due
dueDateTime.description: The date in the specified time zone that the task is to be finished.

reminderDateTime.title: Reminder
reminderDateTime.description: The date and time for a reminder alert of the task to occur.
